text: Roberto De Vicenzo (14 April 1923 â€“ 1 June 2017) was an Argentine professional golfer. He won more than 230 tournaments worldwide in his career including eight on the PGA Tour and most famously the 1967 Open Championship. He was born in Villa Ballester, Argentina. De Vicenzo died on 1 June 2017 in Buenos Aires, Argentina at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== *World Golf Hall of Fame profile *Profile on about.com Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Argentine sportspeople Category:Golfers
title: Roberto De Vicenzo
